::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod walks to Savvana'a position.
"We have some time, they are aways away. I dont think it's the same
Preds, there coming from the direction of the Newcomer base."
Hot Rod activates his comlink, on Maximal fequincy's.
"All Maximals, the Newcomers are heading for the Cybertronian Fire. I f
possible, get here. We need enforcements."
He turns back to Savvana.
"Lets hope their as easy, as those other Preds were."
